availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Martha Hunt Story on December 24, 1812.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Division 2, p. 399. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 135. "Kentucky Marriages, 1785-1979," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FWBL-7YQ : 4 December 2014), Elijah Story and Martha Hunt, 24 Dec 1812; citing Fleming, Kentucky, reference p90 ln23; FHL microfilm 344,015.
